subject: Question RE: Pro X Ultra break install
description_text:
Hello - I just purchased a set of Pro X Ultra pedals and am in the process
of installing them. I cannot figure out what the cable on the brake pedal
in the attached image is used for, and I do not see any references to it in
the instruction manual.

The control box does not have a matching input. Can you please tell me
where this cable connects?

Thank you,
Dam

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Saitta,  This is the signal cable for the footboard LED strip. If you purchased the version with the base plate, please connect it; otherwise, you can ignore this connector.Â
